pages.text: $(li)The Ender Pearl is a item with has ancient magic.$(br)$(li)You can right click while you have the Ender Pearl on your hand to throw it and teleport you were this falls.

$(li)The Ender Pearl can be used to craft Ender Pearl Blocks, Gravisand, Duskbound Lanterns, Eye of Ender, Dimension Compass, Endolocator and even an Ender Armor.$(br)$(li)They may be dropped by slayed Endermans, or Tuba Endermans too.$(br)$(li)Clerics trade this items in exchange of Emerals too.
